content: {"Name": "Living Hope United Methodist Church", "Entity_Id": 72, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Living Hope United Methodist Church", "More_Information": "Procedure: Pantry guests call ahead to schedule an appointment and give their choices for their food pantry bag. Guests come into the pantry to pick up their order as scheduled and additional fresh foods; guests can also pick up available fresh foods on a walk-in basis; the total number of people (guests and volunteers) in the pantry area is limited.\r\n\r\nWaterford residents only. Delivery available on a case-by-case basis.", "Counties": ["Saratoga"], "Location": "Waterford", "Address": "126 Middletown Rd", "City": "Waterford", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12188", "Phone": "(518) 235-6498", "Hours_of_Operation": "Fri 10-11:30am, 1st thursday of month 5:30-7pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.811488", "Longitude": "-73.6864399", "Last_Updated": "02-07-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
